revision.text:
{{Infobox dungeon |name = Dusty Bowl |image = [[File:Dusty Bowl.png|thumb]] |caption = A map of Dusty Bowl. |tokens = 1,570,000 |location = Between Giant's Cap and Giant's Mirror }} '''Dusty Bowl''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 22,923,210 HP.
== Encounter Tables ==
